Requirements You are wielding a Samurai Weapon

You Strike against organic creatures and make them shiver in pain. Make a melee Strike. If you hit, the victim must make a @Check[fortitude|against:class] saving throw, with a -2 penalty to the save if the result of the initial Strike is a critical success.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The target takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 10)/4) + 2)d12[poison]] damage.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target also takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 10)/4) + 2)d6[persistent,poison]] damage.

At 10th level and every 4 levels thereafter, increase the poison damge on a failure by 1d12 and the persistent poison damage on a critical failure by 1d6.
